description: Schema for an Batch Job  Step Status Event
title: Step Status

name.description: This describes the name of the step

account.description: The id of the account processed in this step

sql:
CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS atomic;



CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS atomic.monitoring_batch_step_status_1 (

    'schema_vendor'  VARCHAR(128)  ENCODE RUNLENGTH NOT NULL,

    'schema_name'    VARCHAR(128)  ENCODE RUNLENGTH NOT NULL,

    'schema_format'  VARCHAR(128)  ENCODE RUNLENGTH NOT NULL,

    'schema_version' VARCHAR(128)  ENCODE RUNLENGTH NOT NULL,

    'root_id'        CHAR(36)      ENCODE RAW       NOT NULL,

    'root_tstamp'    TIMESTAMP     ENCODE LZO       NOT NULL,

    'ref_root'       VARCHAR(255)  ENCODE RUNLENGTH NOT NULL,

    'ref_tree'       VARCHAR(1500) ENCODE RUNLENGTH NOT NULL,

    'ref_parent'     VARCHAR(255)  ENCODE RUNLENGTH NOT NULL,

    'name'           VARCHAR(255)  ENCODE LZO       NOT NULL,

    'state'          VARCHAR(9)    ENCODE LZO       NOT NULL,

    'account'        BIGINT        ENCODE LZO,

    'ended_at'       TIMESTAMP     ENCODE LZO,

    'run_id'         VARCHAR(32)   ENCODE LZO,

    'started_at'     TIMESTAMP     ENCODE LZO,

    FOREIGN KEY (root_id) REFERENCES atomic.events(event_id)

)

DISTSTYLE KEY

DISTKEY (root_id)

SORTKEY (root_tstamp);



COMMENT ON TABLE atomic.monitoring_batch_step_status_1 IS 'iglu:monitoring.batch/step_status/jsonschema/1-0-0';
